questions.text: What is a major security concern for IIoT devices?
options: Physical theft of devices
Unauthorized access and control
High power consumption
Limited color options for device casings

questions.text: What is the purpose of data encryption in IIoT?
options: To increase data transmission speed
To compress data size
To protect data from being read by unauthorized parties
To convert data to a different language
questions.correctAnswer: To protect data from being read by unauthorized parties

questions.text: A 'man-in-the-middle' attack in an IIoT context involves:
options: Physically blocking a sensor's view
Sending a flood of data to a server
Intercepting and possibly altering communication between two devices
An employee intentionally causing a system failure
questions.correctAnswer: Intercepting and possibly altering communication between two devices

questions.text: What is a secure boot process in an IIoT device?
options: A boot process that is very fast
A process that verifies the digital signature of software before it runs
A process that requires a physical key to start the device
A process that erases all data on startup
questions.correctAnswer: A process that verifies the digital signature of software before it runs

questions.text: Which of the following is a best practice for securing IIoT devices?
options: Using default factory passwords
Disabling all security features to improve performance
Regularly updating firmware and software
Connecting all devices directly to the public internet

questions.text: What does 'air-gapping' refer to in industrial security?
options: Increasing the physical space between machines
Isolating a computer or network from unsecured networks, like the public internet
A type of cooling system for servers
A wireless communication protocol
questions.correctAnswer: Isolating a computer or network from unsecured networks, like the public internet

questions.text: A Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) attack on an IIoT system aims to:
options: Steal sensitive data
Make a service unavailable by overwhelming it with traffic
Gain control of a physical machine
Install malware on devices
questions.correctAnswer: Make a service unavailable by overwhelming it with traffic

questions.text: What role does a 'Root of Trust' play in IIoT security?
options: It's the main server in the cloud
It's a software library for data analysis
It is a highly reliable hardware or software component that is trusted to provide security functions
It's the lead engineer on a project
questions.correctAnswer: It is a highly reliable hardware or software component that is trusted to provide security functions

questions.text: Which standard is commonly associated with cybersecurity for industrial automation and control systems?
options: ISO 9001
IEEE 802.11
ISA/IEC 62443
Bluetooth 5.0

questions.text: What is the principle of 'least privilege' in cybersecurity?
options: Giving all users maximum access to simplify management
Giving a user or system only the access rights necessary to perform its specific task
The least important devices have the most access
Giving temporary access to everyone
questions.correctAnswer: Giving a user or system only the access rights necessary to perform its specific task
